p: Normal histology of rat kidneys (glomeruli, tubules, interstitium, and blood vessels) was found in the control group ( Figure 6(a)), and the group treated subacutely with 500 mg/kg dose of the HS extract ( Figure 6(b)). However, the histopathological observations demonstrated that a few minor or slight abnormalities were noted in the histoarchitecture of the kidneys from the groups G3 and G4 (1000 mg/kg and 2000 mg/kg) including a reduction of glomerulus cells (red triangle), a loss of tubular cellular components (black arrow), an expansion of the Bowman space (black star), and distortions in the epithelial membrane of the Bowman capsule (Figures 6(c) and 6(d)).
